tweet: This measure will give the FBI the tools it needs to put a stop to the heinous acts of violence occurring in this country without infringing on the Second Amendment.

If Democrats are truly committed to putting a stop to some of the tragedies that have plagued our country in recent years they should stop holding show votes and bring commonsense reforms like the Mass Violence Protect Act to the floor.

Democrats tried again today to infringe on the Second Amendment and make it harder for law abiding citizens to defend themselves by bringing H.R. 1112 up for a vote. I opposed it. https://johnjoyce.house.gov/media/press-releases/joyce-votes-protect-rights-law-abiding-gun-owners …

"So whether it be addressing challenges in our health care system, promoting policies that spur growth and entrepreneurship, or working across the aisle to assist our dairy farmers, I want you to know that, with your help, there is no problem I will shy away from trying to fix."
"This is the type of attitude that I hope to bring to Congress every day – the mindset that there is always something to be done and members of the community are counting on me to do it."
"So as we waited for Democrats to come to the table with little votes to take, I vowed not to waste any time. That’s the type of attitude you have when you come from the private sector."

In tonight’s State of the Union address @realDonaldTrump made it crystal clear to all Americans that we are moving full speed ahead on a path to prosperity. I stand committed to assisting him in continuing to make America great.
